text: Leonardo "Léo" Luiz e Castro (born 13 July 1994) is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Paraná , on loan from Ferroviária, as a forward. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |align="center"|Grêmio Barueri |2015 |Paulista A3 |colspan="2"|—||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||1||0 |- |align="center"|União Barbarense |2015 |Paulista A2 |colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||15All appearance(s) in Copa Paulista||3||15||3 |- |align="center"|Santa Rita |2016 |Alagoano |colspan="2"|—||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||1||0 |- |align="center"|Inter de Lages |2016 |Série D |8||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||8||0 |- |align="center"|Nacional–SP |2017 |Paulista A3 |colspan="2"|—||24||11||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||24||11 |- |rowspan=3 align="center"|Ferroviária |2017 |Paulista |colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||24||14||24||14 |- |2018 |Série D |colspan="2"|—||9||3||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||9||3 |- !colspan="2"|Subtotal !colspan="2"|—!!9!!3!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!24!!14!!33!!17 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !8!!0!!33!!14!!0!!0!!0!!0!!39!!17!!82!!31 |} ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Grêmio Barueri Futebol players Category:União Agrícola Barbarense Futebol Clube players Category:Esporte Clube Internacional de Lages players Category:Nacional Atlético Clube (SP) players Category:Associação Ferroviária de Esportes players
